name: King Shoot: Bottle Shoot
description:
Enjoy and have unlimited ammo with 3d sniper games of bottle shooting 3d game to shoot botellas in bottle shooting games with gun. Instead of using gun in botle shooting you can use sniper rifles for addictive stress relieving stone shooting

Features:
- 3d bottle shooting graphics
- Real hunting games experience
- Target shooting training with bottles
- Use different weapons as sniper training guns
